params.markdown:
The dashboard below displays data for a single GPU. Use the selectors above to choose a specific GPU by UUID or Name.
The dashboard provides details on the following:
- GPU utilization
- GPU power consumption
- GPU temperature
- PCIe packet replays
- Streaming multiprocessor frequency
- Memory frequency

query.query: data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu.pct:*
data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu.pct:*
data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu.pct:*
data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu.pct:*
data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu.pct:*
